alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 5:29PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, central Jones, northwestern Shackelford and Throckmorton Counties through 615 PM CST... At 528 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Westover to Noodle. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Anson, Throckmorton, Hawley, Lueders, Woodson, Irby, Paint Creek, Nugent, Elbert, Avoca, Lake Stamford Marina, Fort Griffin, Funston, Big Country Baptist Assembly, Truby, Us- 183 Near The Throckmorton-Baylor County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 283 And Ranch Road 209, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600 and The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us-283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
